altername_name: ニンジャウォーリアーズ
name: The Ninja Warriors
overview: Conversion of Taito's scrolling ninja slash 'em up. Playing as a choice of male or female robot ninja, you make your way across the horizontally scrolling play area slashing enemies and throwing shurikens from a limited supply. As you take hits your robot form is slowly revealed until you explode - then it's Game Over.
